game.name: Ascend the Dome
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A 3D rage-climbing game where you have to escape by scaling up different domes all the way to the top. Face all kinds of parkour challenges that’ll push your precision and skills to the limit! Connect your game to your Twitch chat!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 3D rage-climbing game where you have to escape by scaling up different domes all the way to the top. Face all kinds of parkour challenges that’ll push your precision and skills to the limit! Connect your game to your Twitch chat!
